properties.address: Old School Hub & Cafe, Langholm, Dumfriesshire DG13 0QJ
properties.description: We are a safe, inclusive warm space open to all, 7 days a week 11am-4pm Mon-Thurs- Our Normal Cafe Service. Last Hot Food Orders 2.45pm Sunday Lunch Service 12-2.30 -Booking Essential Tuesdays-Weds Speciality Coffee's, Teas, Cakes and Scones. Every Tuesday 12noon-1pm Lunch Club, 2 course set menu for £3 Warm Hub’ on Wednesdays, 11am till 2pm. This is a warm, safe space where members of the community, and beyond, can expect a warm welcome. Come and get cosy by the fire, and enjoy a hot drink, free of charge. Light refreshments (soup, cake etc) will be provided, free of charge. Donations are welcome. Every Wednesday we have our ‘Warm Hub’ on from 11am till 2pm. This is a warm, safe space where members of the community, and beyond, can expect a warm welcome. Come and get cosy by the fire, and enjoy a hot drink, free of charge. Light refreshments (soup, cake etc) will be provided, free of charge. Donations are welcome. everyone is welcome, space for all We also have a gardening club and community garden, community gift shop with local gifts. We have an exhibition space. we also have an access for all playpark. We are dog friendly. We host events and activities. community library , and consultation room.
properties.title: The Eskdalemuir Hub and Old School Cafe

properties.address: 3 Church Gate, Moffat, Scotland, DG10 9EG, United Kingdom
